news.title: Tax rises, benefits and minimum wage. What could be in today's Budget?
news.summary: Chancellor Rachel Reeves is considering both tax rises and spending cuts in the 26 November Budget.

news.title: Ukraine says 'understanding' reached on US peace plan, as Trump envoy to meet Putin
news.summary: Kyiv and Washington have moved closer to agreeing the shape of a deal to end the fighting, with Putin to be consulted next week.

news.title: Italian parliament unanimously votes to make femicide a crime
news.summary: The gender-motivated murder of a woman will now be covered by a distinct clause in Italian law - punishable by a life sentence.

news.title: 'I'm on Â£22,000 and want free bus travel for all students'
news.summary: BBC News hears from people with a range of incomes about what they want to see in the Budget.

news.title: Palestinian-US teen held by Israel for nine months without charge due in court
news.summary: Mohammed Ibrahim, 16, from Florida, was detained by Israeli soldiers while on holiday in the occupied West Bank.

news.title: 'I would love to be doing this in my 60s' - the debate over selling sex in Scotland
news.summary: Porcelain Victoria is concerned that a potential change in law in Scotland could drive sex workers into poverty.

news.title: Twenty-four Nigerian schoolgirls released over a week after abduction
news.summary: Hundreds of children remain missing following other recent abductions in Nigeria.

news.title: Russian mercenaries accused of cold-blooded killings in Mali - BBC speaks to eyewitnesses
news.summary: Refugees have given the BBC a harrowing account of atrocities committed by the Russian paramilitary force.

news.title: The Papers: 'Rachel Reeves' Budget Ledger' and 'Jury trials scrapped'
news.summary: Budget day is here and the newspapers focus on the chancellor's highly-anticipated statement.

news.title: The looming election Trump can't afford to lose
news.summary: In a Tennessee district the president won by 22% last year, a Democratic upset could prompt Republican panic.
